page.hW: AS3 HTML BOX with XML and CSS support
page.span:
Hi everyone.
This HTML Box has been created with only AS3. And all codes have been written in external "as" files.
With the tutorial below, you'll learn:
How to create external classes.
How to load, parse and use XML and CSS files in an htmlText.
How to create new events with "dispatchEvent" and use those events.
How to use "TextEvent" in htmlText.
How to use htmlText tags.
